name: Shield Brothers
description:
Shield Brothers - Hold the line, we are stronger together.

A Game for the 2021 Brackey's Game Jam. Made in 7 days.

How To Play:

Your troops hold the line on the left and will automatically attack when the enemy are in range.

Use your powers to destroy them:

Shield Bash - Stuns the enemy so they can't attack

Axes- Lowers the enemy's defence

Spears - Hurt the enemy's Health

Odin's Favour - Recover some your heath and defence

Music was done by my Brother Luke, Cheers Mate

Everything else was created by me.

Thanks For Playing!
